    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ever-Vigilant Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2937) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 73 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon has enhanced senses. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception, and can't be flanked except by creatures that are higher level than it. It can see [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures and objects; they appear translucent and are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). When your eidolon moves within 30 feet of an [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) that can be [disbelieved](/Rules.aspx?ID=267), the GM rolls a [secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=142) check to disbelieve it, even if your eidolon didn't spend an action to Interact.
name: Ever-Vigilant Senses

It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception, and can't be flanked except by creatures that are higher level than it. It can see invisible creatures and objects; they appear translucent and are concealed. When your eidolon moves within 30 feet of an illusion that can be disbelieved, the GM rolls a secret check to disbelieve it, even if your eidolon didn't spend an action to Interact.
